items.title: U.S. indictment against Venezuela President Maduro, wife is unsealed
items.description: The indictment was unsealed hours after U.S. forces launched an attack on Venezuela and captured its president Nicolas Maduro and his wife, Cilia Flor...

items.title: Watch: Trump addresses the nation following U.S. strike against Venezuela
items.description: President Donald Trump is scheduled to speak Saturday morning following a stunning, large-scale attack on Venezuela overnight.

items.title: U.S. attacks Venezuela, captures Maduro and his wife; AG Bondi says charges include 'Narco-Terrorism'
items.description: Maduro and his wife were captured and removed from the country following the operation, Trump said in a statement on Truth Social.

items.title: 'An act of armed aggression': World leaders react to the U.S. attack on Venezuela
